stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Uncover Early Signs of the Dreaded Forgetfulness Curse!
stories.fantasy_story: Arcane scholars have found a hidden magical whisper in the minds of folk. This unique energy pattern can foretell if someone might soon suffer from the creeping Forgetfulness Curse. Using special scrying crystals, they can now glimpse these subtle changes before the sickness truly takes hold.

stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Forge Crystal that Commands Lodestone's Swirling Power!
